name: The Blue Moon: Plant Crops
description:
Quick! Plant as many crops as possible before your chance to grow them faster runs out!

You must plant your crops in 10 seconds or else you lose! There is even an extra mode which has 1 level, it's pretty difficult. The mode I will leave for you to find! Hint: ?

Made for the Mini Jam 130: Lunar game jam: Theme: Lunar, Limitation: 10 seconds
